Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager
  • public class RegistrationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    RegistrationManager handles the login of users, both students and a registrar, by keeping track of the current user. Also stores a course catalog and student directory which can be loaded by a user that doesn't have to be logged in.
    Author:
    Ethan Taylor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  RegistrationManager.Registrar
      Registrar is a special type of User with extended permissions

      void logout()

      void resetSchedule()

      • login

        public boolean login​(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Logs in a user based on the specified credentials (id and password). If the credentials match the registrar's creditials loaded in from registrar.properties, the user will be logged in as registrar
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the account to login to
        password - the password of the account to login to
        Returns:
        true if the user is logged in
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if unable to hash the password or...

        public void logout()
        Logs the currentUser out by setting the currentUser variable to null

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if enrolled

      • dropStudentFromCourse

        public boolean dropStudentFromCourse​(Course c)
        Returns true if the logged in student can drop the given course.
        Parameters:
        c - Course to drop
        Returns:
        true if dropped

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule()
        Resets the logged in student's schedule by dropping them from every course and then resetting the schedule.
